response.original_title: Beast In Black Live at Summer Breeze 2025
response.overview: Beast In Black from Finland have quickly made an international name for themselves as an outstanding power metal band since their formation in 2015. Founded by former Battle Beast guitarist Anton Kabanen, the band combines powerful guitar riffs, catchy melodies, and anthemic choruses into an energetic metal sound.  Singer Yannis Papadopoulos impresses with his versatile voice, effortlessly switching between melodic clean vocals and powerful metal shouts. Their lyrics often deal with personal, emotional, and imaginative themes.  Setlist: "Cry Out for a Hero", "Hardcore", "Born Again", "Power of the Beast", "Sweet True Lies", "Moonlight Rendezvous", "To the Last Drop of Blood", "Blind and Frozen", "Beast in Black", "Unlimited Sin", "Enter the Behelit", "Die by the Blade", "Blade Runner", "One Night in Tokyo", "End of the World"
response.tagline: Recording from August 16th at the Summer Breeze Open Air 2025 in Dinkelsb√ºhl.
response.title: Beast In Black Live at Summer Breeze 2025
